N5.meaning: or (A or B, choice between 2 objects)
N5.arti: atau (A atau B, pilihan antara 2 objek)
mengubah kata kerja menjadi kata benda

N5.meaning: because of, the reason is that
is okay, is alright to, can

N4.meaning: to suddenly begin, to suddenly appear
to show signs of, to feel, to think
it must be, it should be
to want something, to be in need of
to be, to come, to go
(turns a sentence into a yes/no question)

N4.arti: mengubah kata kerja menjadi kata benda

N4.bunpou: なければいけない/なければならない
なくてはいけない/なくてはならない

N4.meaning: although, in spite of, even though

N4.bunpou: のように / のような

N4.meaning: to be able to do something

N4.arti: mengubah kata sifat menjadi kata benda

N4.meaning: to be made to do something
I heard that, it is said that

N4.arti: baru saja dilakukan, sesuatu baru saja terjadi

N4.meaning: just finished doing, was just doing
N4.arti: baru saja selesai melakukan, baru saja melakukan

N4.meaning: to come to, to become, to continue
to get somebody to do something
to do something by accident, to finish completely
N4.arti: melakukan sesuatu secara tidak sengaja, menyelesaikan sepenuhnya

N4.meaning: changes a sentence or phrase into a noun
N4.arti: mengubah kalimat atau frasa menjadi kata benda

N4.meaning: about to, on the verge of
it seems that, it appears that, it looks like
to try to, to make sure that

N3.meaning: should, can, it’d be good if
not only… but also, as well as
should have, it would have been better if
must not do, should not do
N3.arti: tidak boleh dilakukan, sebaiknya tidak dilakukan

N3.meaning: covered all over in, full of
to pretend, to act as if
apt to do, tend to do
the more, to the extent that, so much… that
on one hand, on the other hand
N3.arti: di satu sisi, di sisi lain

N3.meaning: to do something completely to the end
being too much to finish or complete
there is no need to, never happens
to the extent that, so… that
used to do something, should do something

N3.bunpou: に関する / に関して
において/ における
N3.meaning: in, on, at, as for, regarding
in contrast to, while, in regard to

N3.bunpou: によると / によれば

N3.meaning: leaving something on, leaving something still in use
N3.arti: membiarkan sesuatu tetap menyala atau digunakan

N3.meaning: for, for the sake of, in order to
because of, as a result of
it would be nice if, should, I hope
N3.arti: akan menyenangkan jika, sebaiknya, saya harap

N3.meaning: just (now, at the moment), as soon as
not until, only after… did I
on the way, in the middle of
although I say, although one might say
N3.arti: meskipun saya bilang, meskipun orang mungkin bilang

N3.meaning: I’ve heard that, rumour has it that
N3.arti: saya dengar bahwa, rumor mengatakan bahwa

N3.meaning: speaking of, if it were the case that
in the way, the same as

N3.bunpou: としたら / とすれば
N3.meaning: if it were the case that, if we assume
N3.arti: jika itu terjadi, jika kita berasumsi

N3.meaning: not necessarily so, is not always true
N3.arti: tidak selalu begitu, tidak selalu benar

N3.meaning: while you are at it, on the occasion
N3.arti: sementara Anda sedang melakukannya, pada kesempatan itu

N3.meaning: in other words; that is to say
for that reason, no wonder, as you’d expect
N3.arti: oleh karena itu, tidak heran, seperti yang Anda harapkan

N3.meaning: it doesn’t mean that, it is not the case
N3.arti: itu tidak berarti bahwa, itu tidak terjadi

N3.meaning: have a feeling that, think that
not try to, not make an effort to
can’t help but feel, can’t help but do
N3.arti: tidak bisa tidak merasakan, tidak bisa tidak melakukan

N2.meaning: it’s worth one’s effort to do something
in terms of, from the point of view of
from the point of view of, by the look of
now that, since, so long as

N2.bunpou: からすると / からすれば
かと思ったら / かと思うと
N2.meaning: then again, just when, no sooner than
as long as, while… is the case
no chance of, … is definitely not possible
N2.arti: tidak ada kemungkinan, … pasti tidak mungkin

N2.meaning: to be expected to, to be scheduled to
shouldn’t do something, it’s impossible to do something
N2.arti: tidak seharusnya melakukan sesuatu, tidak mungkin melakukan sesuatu

N2.meaning: furthermore, still, yet [used to add more information to the sentence]
N2.arti: selanjutnya, masih, namun [digunakan untuk menambahkan informasi lebih lanjut dalam kalimat]

N2.meaning: can’t help but feel, can’t help but do
N2.arti: tidak bisa tidak merasakan, tidak bisa tidak melakukan

N2.meaning: it’s not that…, can, may be
at the time, on the occasion of
not just, not only… but also
nothing better than, there’s nothing like
N2.arti: tidak ada yang lebih baik dari, tidak ada yang seperti itu

N2.meaning: to relate to, to have to do with
it’s best that, there’s nothing better than
N2.arti: yang terbaik adalah, tidak ada yang lebih baik dari

N2.meaning: towards, to face, to head to
on the occasion of, at the time of
from the point of view of
both… and…, every time something happens
N2.arti: baik… maupun…, setiap kali sesuatu terjadi
tidak heran, … adalah hal yang wajar

N2.meaning: it’s only natural that, no wonder
to do something to the end
with… as a start, as a result of
N2.arti: dengan… sebagai awal, sebagai hasil dari

N2.meaning: as a good opportunity to, as a result of
N2.arti: sebagai kesempatan baik untuk, sebagai hasil dari

N2.bunpou: を通じて/ を通して

N2.meaning: at the time, in case of

N2.arti: lebih jauh lagi, sekali lagi, semakin banyak
selain itu, sebagai tambahan, lebih jauh lagi

N2.meaning: extremely unlikely to, showing no signs of
N2.arti: sangat tidak mungkin, tidak menunjukkan tanda-tanda

N2.meaning: not one bit, not even a little
even if, even though, no matter how

N2.bunpou: てばかりはいられない

N2.meaning: even if one has to, by all means
before, in front of, from one’s standpoint
N2.arti: sebelum, di depan, dari sudut pandang seseorang

N2.meaning: very, extremely, can’t help but do
N2.arti: sangat, luar biasa, tidak bisa tidak melakukan

N2.meaning: natural, as a matter of course

N2.arti: tidak boleh, tidak bisa, seharusnya tidak

N2.meaning: there is no guarantee that…, not necessarily
N2.arti: tidak ada jaminan bahwa…, tidak harus

N2.meaning: was just about to do something
as well, besides, in addition to

N2.bunpou: ようがない/ようもない
N2.meaning: there’s no way to, it’s impossible to
N2.arti: tidak ada cara untuk, mustahil untuk

N2.meaning: can’t help doing, have no choice but
N2.arti: tidak bisa tidak melakukan, tidak ada pilihan selain

N1.meaning: to the end, to the utmost degree
it’s not like, it isn’t as if
once something occurs, something else happens
N1.arti: setelah sesuatu terjadi, sesuatu yang lain terjadi

N1.bunpou: いかんでは/いかんによっては

N1.meaning: at any rate, in any case
as much as, as many as

N1.bunpou: ないではおかない/ずにはおかない
ないではすまない/ずにはすまない

N1.arti: tidakkah kita bisa...? tidakkah saya bisa...?

N1.meaning: in any case, as you know
N1.arti: bagaimanapun juga, seperti yang Anda tahu

N1.meaning: I don’t know about A, but B
N1.arti: saya tidak tahu tentang A, tetapi B

N1.meaning: in one’s own way or style
it’s not worth, there’s no need to
at, during, in the condition of
as for, when it comes to
if you ask, if one may say
N1.arti: jika Anda bertanya, jika boleh dikatakan

N1.meaning: to have a limit, to go too far
to be enough, to be worthy of
to be forced to do something
as it is, in its own way

N1.bunpou: てもどうにもならない

N1.meaning: I said, I told you to
if, if it’s the case that
(I’m not sure if it’s) A or B
N1.arti: saya tidak yakin apakah itu A atau B

N1.bunpou: というところだ/といったところだ

N1.meaning: it’s not that, it doesn’t mean that
N1.arti: bukan berarti itu, tidak berarti itu

N1.meaning: to be regarded as, to be expected to
at the sight of, upon seeing
to do something without thinking about it

N1.bunpou: ともなると/ともなれば
としたって/としたところで

N1.meaning: having said that, be that as it may
the moment that, as soon as

N1.bunpou: (よ)うが～まいが/(よ)うと～まいと

N1.meaning: even if one tries to do something, it can’t be done
N1.arti: bahkan jika seseorang mencoba melakukan sesuatu, itu tidak bisa dilakukan
